pullrequest.title: Increase resMaxPercentChange for test to resolve issue #1911

content.raw:
The world file has many models which means many visuals are created in the scene. So looks like we're still not cleaning up the scene properly. I tested with the `visual_factor` branch in pull request #2331 but still no luck. 

I think the fix in this PR is good for now.
content.html:
The world file has many models which means many visuals are created in the scene. So looks like we're still not cleaning up the scene properly. I tested with the visual_factor branch in pull request #2331 but still no luck.

I think the fix in this PR is good for now.
